summary: This mod add a Fire Mage Standalone Follower. Multiple Hairstyles. UNP - UNPB - SeveNBase - CBBE Available.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][color=#a2c4c9][b][size=5]Introduction[/size][/b][/color][/font]

Hello everyone !

English is not my native langage, im sorry for that.

Nihel is a standalone follower that mean you dont need anything else to make her face and body like in my screenshots. I highly recommend Facelight like always !


Nihel comes with a total of four hairstyles. She is totally standalone but you can unequip her elf ears (that's mean ... really mean T_T) because they are from Nouseheres Mod, simple as that. All hairstyles are referenced in images section. You always need Main File then select the optional hairstyle of your choice. Install with NMM or manually. Also, four body type available: UNP - UNPB - SeveNBase - CBBE. I don't plan to release another body type.
[color=#ffe599]
[/color][center][font=Georgia][color=#ffe599][b]
A Fomod install has been Added [/b][/color][/font][i][b]
Big Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7831761]krysalynne[/url] [/b][/i][/center]


Nihel is a Fire Mage with some perks/spells from others trees but she mainly does damage with fire spells. She also has some control spells, but she's squishy and has only 1 high-level defense spell. You'll have to protect her, but she deals strong damage as a mage should. You'll find her in The Blue Palace (Solitude).

She starts with apprentice Armor and an iron dagger... that's all. You can equip her with whatever you want. She will level up with the player.

[center][b]
Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1054929]Supertin[/url][/b] !!!
[youtube]SK4MSieQSgI[/youtube]

[b]Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19032179]IconicModifications[/url][/b] !!!
[youtube]YdKCx9Qx9X0[/youtube]

[b]Thanks to VatiWah[/b] !
[youtube]w43Kxd_GSUo[/youtube][/center]


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/u2YiiCB.png[/img][/center][center][b]Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2844062]Syphoid[/url] for this wonderful screenshot[/b]

[i]I really like it[/i] :3[/center]
[center][/center][b][font=Georgia][size=5][color=#a2c4c9]
Character [/color][/size][/font][/b]

Nihel is the daughter of a rich merchant. Skyrim is her birthplace and, more precisely, the capital of Solitude. She grew up with only her father. She lost her mother under mysterious circumstances when she was still a baby. She was a lonely child who preferred reading books and studying to playing with other children and her father was always too busy with his business. Her interest in studying magic came at a very early age, and around her fifteen birthday, she moved from Solitude, against her father's wishes, and joined the College of Winterhold. Her affinity with magic was evident from the very first day at the College. Only a few years passed and, as expected, she quickly learned and perfected her mastery of magic spells, especially with the element of fire. By the age of twenty, she was a confirmed and powerful mage. But, her fast progression had a down side and a lot of things went wrong, including mental troubles. She became more and more uninstable. Her "lunacy" caused her to get into a lot of trouble during this period, and her state is even worse at the present time. She is bipolar, a bit schizophrenic, sometimes she even hears voices. While she can be the most adorable person one instant, in the next instant she can become a real devil and have the only one desire ... to burn everything in a storm of fire.

She's a powerful ally ... but well ... Take care ... She's kinda scary sometimes...
[u][b]

Basic Info[/b][/u]

Name : Nihel

Level : Lvl up with player

Marriageable : Yes

Body : UNP / UNPB / SeveNBase / CBBE ( Height 0.94 - Weight 100 )
[list][*][color=#d5a6bd][size=1]Optional Weight 0 available[/size][/color]
[/*]
[/list]
Location : Solitude, The Blue Palace

Default Outfit : 

- Apprentice Armor

- Iron Dagger

[size=4][b]Perks[/b][/size] :

[u][b][i]Destruction[/i][/b][/u]

- Master Destruction
- [i]Destruction Dual Casting[/i]
- [i]Impact[/i]
- [i]Intense Flames[/i]
- [i]Rune Master[/i]

[u][b][i]Alteration[/i][/b][/u]

- Master Alteration
- Stability


[i][b][u]Illusion

[/u][/b][/i]- Quiet Casting

[u][i][b]Restoration

[/b][/i][/u]- [i]Recovery[/i][u][i]

[/i][/u][u][i][b]Sneak[/b][/i][/u]

- Light Foot


[size=4]Spells[/size] :

- Fireball
- Firebolt
- Fire Rune
- Fire Storm
- FlameCloak
- Flames
- Incinerate
- Paralyze
- Mass Paralysis
- Wall Of Flames
- DragonHide

[color=#a2c4c9][b][font=Georgia][size=5]
Recommended Mods[/size][/font][/b][/color]

[i][b]Big thanks to [/b][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7831761]krysalynne[/url] [/b][/i][b][i]for helping me with english description and fomod install[/i]
[/b]
[b][font=Georgia][color=#a2c4c9][size=5]Mods used in screenshots[/size][/color][/font][/b]
